sources.title: Paradis Pour Tous 1982
sources.description: From IMDb: Doctor Valois has invented the "flashage", a cure for depressed people. After having tested it on monkeys, he tries with a first human patient, Alain Durieux. This is a great success, everybody's happy except maybe Alain's wife, Jeanne, who worries about the changes in Alain's personality. Other patients use the treatment with similar success, and Valois's happy about it. But the monkeys are changing: non-cured ones are made mad by the over stability and stereotyped behavior of the cured ones. So are the humans. When Valois realizes he can't stop the process, he decides to "flash" himself. _______ French with optional English Subtitles
